data.name: CPU Cores ADVANCED :: Maximize your FPS
data.detailed_description:
Building on the wildly popular CPUCores, we have completely rebuilt our application from the ground up to give the user the ultimate experience in CPU and Computer Resource Management.

This newest version of CPUCores will include automatic detection of games you are running, and automatic CPU and Resource Management while games are active. We have also included an automatic shutdown component, which will automatically revert your hardware and software settings to the way they were when you engaged CPUCores, ensuring that there is no reduced performance outside of the games you enjoy.

This streamlined experience, plus a gorgeous new GUI and Overlay system will make our application even more customizable than before, but with the option to make everything invisible and not distracting in the least.
data.about_the_game:
Building on the wildly popular CPUCores, we have completely rebuilt our application from the ground up to give the user the ultimate experience in CPU and Computer Resource Management.

This newest version of CPUCores will include automatic detection of games you are running, and automatic CPU and Resource Management while games are active. We have also included an automatic shutdown component, which will automatically revert your hardware and software settings to the way they were when you engaged CPUCores, ensuring that there is no reduced performance outside of the games you enjoy.

This streamlined experience, plus a gorgeous new GUI and Overlay system will make our application even more customizable than before, but with the option to make everything invisible and not distracting in the least.
data.short_description: CPUCores ADVANCED is built to be the highest performance-enhancing Resource Management tool available with instant automatic integration with Steam and your favorite games.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit, Windows 8 64-bit, Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Any dual core CPU or higher. Low/Medium/Medium-High 2/4/6 core CPU systems preferred.
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit, Windows 8 64-bit, Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Any dual core CPU or higher. Low/Medium/Medium-High 2/4/6 core CPU systems preferred.
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
